name: format
content: REGEX {EIF_CLASS}_{PROFILE}{REGEX}msg PRINTF("LogFile : %s : %s : %s",probe,HtId,eventclass)hostname DEFAULTorigin DEFAULTfqhostname DEFAULTeventclass $1 CustomSlot1HtId "{HTID}" CustomSlot2probe FILENAME CustomSlot3threshold REGEX CustomSlot4severity "{SEVERITY}" CustomSlot5profile "{PROFILE}" CustomSlot6END
